name: So You Want to Build a Snowman (selkieofdoom)
name_original: So You Want to Build a Snowman (selkieofdoom)
description:
Hi, friend!  Want to start off the winter right?  Presenting: "So You Want to Build a Snowman."  

Use arrow keys to explore the enchanted forest, collect items, and build a snowman!
(Swipe and tap on mobile)

Gameplay: 1-2 minutes

This is my first game, made with Bitsy.  It's wholesome and simple, and I'm pretty happy with how it turned out.
